durres.name: Durrës
durres.description: Durrës is Albania's second largest city and main seaport, known for its rich Roman and Byzantine heritage, beautiful beaches, and strategic location on the Adriatic coast.

founding.significance: Ancient Greek colony and major trading port

historical.name: Durrës Amphitheatre
historical.description: One of the largest Roman amphitheatres in the Balkans

historical.name: Durrës Archaeological Museum
historical.description: Houses extensive collection of ancient artifacts

natural.name: Durrës Beach
natural.description: Long sandy beach along the Adriatic

arrival_options.description: Major port with ferry connections to Italy
Well-connected to Tirana and other Albanian cities
